title: Password Generator
desc: A simple application that takes in user input and generates a password within given parameters

title: Expedition Apetite
desc: An Application that helps users plan trips by allowing them to search for restaurants within areas they intend to visit

title: Emomii: Mood Tracker

title: Employee Directory
desc: A mockup of an employee directory that allows the user to search for eomployees by name, and sort by first name.

title: Memory Game
desc: A memory game that requires the user to click on all the different images, without cliking on the same one twice.
